## ASSIGNMENT 14 - TAYLOR SERIES
This week, weâ€™ll work out some Taylor Series expansions of popular functions

$f(x) = \frac {1}{(1-x)}$


```{r}
library(calculus)
myf=function(x) 1/(1-x)
taylor(myf, var=c(x=1), order=6)
```


for this expression:


$f(x) = e^x$

```{r}
myf=function(x) exp(x)
taylor(myf, var=c(x=1), order=6)
```


for the expression :
$f(x) = ln(1+x)$

```{r}
myf=function(x) log1p(x)
taylor(myf, var=c(x=1), order=6)

```



for the expression:
$f(x) = x^{(1/2)}$

```{r}
myf=function(x) x^(1/2)
taylor(myf, var=c(x=1), order=6)

```
